scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=packages/vite-plugin-mirrorstate && npm run build --workspace=packages/react-mirrorstate
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "plugin,react,examples" -c "magenta,green,yellow" "npm run dev:plugin" "npm run dev:react" "npm run examples"
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm publish --workspace=packages/vite-plugin-mirrorstate && npm publish --workspace=packages/react-mirrorstate
